title: Simple Vinaigrette Recipe
full_text:
Simple Vinaigrette Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
3 mins
Active
3 mins
Total
3 mins
Serves
6
to 8 servings
Makes
1 cup vinaigrette
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
3
tablespoons
white wine vinegar
or
lemon juice
1
tablespoon
water
4
teaspoons
Dijon mustard
1/2
cup
neutral oil
(such as
canola
)
1/4
cup
flavored oil
(such as
extra-virgin olive oil
)
1/2
teaspoon
salt
1/4
teaspoon
freshly
ground black pepper
Directions
Combine all ingredients in small container or squeeze bottle. Seal container and shake vigorously until emulsified. Shake again before each use.
